data.name: My Stepbro is a Femboy
data.detailed_description:
Your first time home in months and family is excited to see, your stepbro in particular seems very excited for some reason.

Your aunt and uncle also came to visit for the weekend, so you will be sleeping with your stepbro in his room.
A thin mattress on the floor won't be the most comfortable thing, but maybe you can convince your stepbro to let you sleep with himâ€”head to toes of course... ðŸ˜œ

Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions.

Gameplay

  • Choose your sexual organ (Penis or Vagina)
  • Customizable nouns, pronouns, names and colors
  • H-Scenes
  • ~7K words

Immerse yourself in the story by typing in your own name, then proceeding to read through a raunchy story from the first-person perspective.

data.short_description: With your aunt and uncle visiting, you're sharing a room with your stepbro for the weekend.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
*All characters in this game are over the age of 21 years old.
